DOC.brief_summary: This observational study aim evaluate possibility use data capnography device assess obstructive airway severity Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Asthma patient .
DOC.brief_title: Obstructive Airways Diseases Emergency Department ( OADED ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: This feasibility observational study aim evaluate possibility use data capnography device assess obstructive airway severity COPD Asthma patient . The study include adult asthma COPD patient ( age > 18 ) arrive Emergency Department ( ED ) . Patients enrol continuous basis monitor capnograph oximeter , lung function assessment medical treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 2 . Ability willingness participate study sign inform consent form 3 . Asthma / COPD patient 1 . Pregnant woman 2 . Asthma COPD patient FEV1 > 60 % 3 . Disability unwillingness undergo capnography measurement 4 . Can assess FEV1 5 . Oxygen supply > 5 L/min
